snippet: As MSG televised the team’s practice live, Coach Mike Woodson focused on what he was said was going to be “the key to our success.”
abstract: New York Knicks let cameras into their training center, giving fans and members of the news media a rare opportunity to watch coach Mike Woodson direct his team through a full practice.
lead_paragraph: As MSG televised the team’s practice live, Coach Mike Woodson focused on what he was said was going to be “the key to our success.”

headline.seo: With Cameras Rolling, Knicks Keep the Ball Moving
headline.main: With Cameras Rolling, Knicks Keep the Ball Moving
headline.print_headline: With Cameras Rolling, Knicks Keep the Ball Moving
